title.bibl: Daily Jewish Courier, June 19, 1918. Convention of Civil Service Commissioners

div.bibl: Daily Jewish Courier, June 19, 1918. CONVENTION OF CIVIL SERVICE COMMISSIONERS

body.p: The annual convention of the National Association of Civil Service Commissioners opened yesterday in Milwaukee. The convention will continue today and tomorrow.

Mr. Harry A. Lipsky, president of the Cook County Civil Service Commission, will be the only Jew at this convention. He is also the only Jew in America who holds such a high office. The other commissioners, Ralph L. Peck and J. Whalen, accompanied him to the convention.
